import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { public eventos: any = []; widthImg: number = 50; marginImg: number = 2; showImage: boolean = true; showOrHideImage(){ this.showImage = !this.showImage; } constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getEventos() } public getEventos(): void { this.http.get('https://localhost:5001/api/evento').subscribe( response => this.eventos = response, error => console.log(error) ); } }
